articles.author: Emily Price
articles.title: Spotify Considered Removing White Noise Podcasts to Avoid Creator Payouts - PCMag
articles.description: Creators can make close to $18,000 per month from ads on white noise podcasts, which basically feature the same sound on repeat. Removing them could've saved Spotify $38 million per year.
